items.title: Coach & Mentor
items.description: Assisted a team of young women during a web development course, providing guidance, technical support, and encouragement throughout their learning process.

items.title: Mentor
items.description: Mentored an aspiring UX designer transitioning from marketing to design. Provided strategic guidance on portfolio, job search, and application materials. Supported the mentee throughout the process, culminating in successful job placement within the design field.
